title: Iterative Instructional Design Process for Simulation-Based Science Training

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental science concepts and basic operation of digital devices
context.additional_context: Development of learner-customized training programs through iterative design processes using simulation tools

learning_goals: Learners can iteratively refine and optimize scientific experiment procedures in a simulation environment at least three times.
Learners can identify and improve at least two design flaws based on peer feedback.
Learners can reassess and revise existing designs at least once when new information arises.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
